posts.post_title: Couple of decent looking T206s to trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bob Donaldson
Hi,

I'd be interested in trading the t206s below for;
T205s
T202s
Diamond Stars
67 Hi Number Stars

or any thing else you care to tempt me with

my want list is [url]http://www.oldbaseball.com/wantlists/bdonaldson.htm[/url]

[IMG]http://mysite.verizon.net/obcbobd/t206group-F.jpg[/IMG]


[IMG]http://mysite.verizon.net/obcbobd/t206group-B.jpg[/IMG]

I have other cards to trade shown at [url]http://tcardstotrade.shutterfly.com[/url]/

thanks

Bob
